title: Biscuit Scrapings
body:
We are often asked: "How did Peggy Babcock's Biscuit Scrapings come into being and how are they so delicious?"

The answer to the first part is that one of our team couldn't stand the shrimp filling in our pink wafers and would scrape it out with his teeth.

We thought this was such a great idea that we have a team at the end of the assembly line to disassemble half of the biscuits. Although they don't use their teeth! For hygiene purposes, they have to use their fingers.
